Description: Textile fragment; fairly coarse linen cloth, mainly undyed (now dark straw colour), but with a wide band of blue weft threads. Above the band is a starting border. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.24 ends per 10mm and weft c.8 picks per 10mm. The starting border is a tabby with 5 sheds with paired threads, other edges being torn.
